item.description: Okay, I am still nervous about trying out Cajun Cafe without having eaten there before and nobody else has either. I would hate for us to go and risk it. So let's go to Black Eyed Sally's. I think I have eaten there before and quite a few members have emailed me and suggested it. On May 15th, they have Acoustic Stage: "Sally brings you the areas best singer-songwriters each week from 9-12. No Cover and $2 Coors Lights." So we can eat and then stay for some music!
item.why: This is a fun group and we are going to a fun restaurant.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Cajun Food at Black Eyed Sally's
